Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 7200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g5' config.apx = -23 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 91.87 config.beamcenterz = 95.57 config.drive()
